UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile, including their role and loyalty information.

cafeNickname.description: User's preferred nickname for order callouts.

loyaltyLevelId.description: ID of the user's current loyalty level.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

MenuItem.title: Menu Item
MenuItem.description: A single item available on the cafe's menu.

id.description: Unique ID for the menu item.

description.description: A brief description of the item.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category this item belongs to.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A category for organizing menu items.

type.description: A broader type for grouping categories (e.g., 'coffee').

LoyaltyLevel.title: Loyalty Level
LoyaltyLevel.description: Defines a tier in the loyalty program.

id.description: Unique ID for the loyalty level (e.g., 'gold').

minimumPoints.description: Points required to reach this level.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer's order for pickup.

customerId.description: The UID of the user who placed the order.

orderDate.description: Timestamp of when the order was placed.

menuItemIds.description: List of IDs of the menu items in the order.

pointsRedeemed.description: The number of loyalty points redeemed for this order.

discountApplied.description: The monetary discount applied to this order from redeemed points.
